title: Hotel Booking
description: Developed a full-stack hotel booking platform with secure user authentication using Clerk, Tailwind css, seamless room reservation functionality, and integrated Stripe for online payments. Implemented real-time email confirmations for bookings and built an admin dashboard for efficient hotel room management and booking oversight, streamlining operations and enhancing the user experience.

title: Rona Design
description: Developed a scalable e-commerce platform with a seamless shopping experience, secure authentication, and integrated PayPal for online transactions. Built an admin panel for efficient product and order management, streamlining store operations and inventory tracking.

title: Chat With Me
description: Built a real-time chat web app using the MERN stack and Socket.IO with secure authentication, online/offline status, unread message count, and a responsive UI. Deployed on Vercel for public access.

title: YouTube Clone
description: Built a YouTube-like platform that fetches and displays video content dynamically using the YouTube Data API. Implemented category-based filtering and responsive design to enhance the user experience across devices.

title: Concierge Management System
description: Designed a solution for concierge services, replacing manual record-keeping with an automated system for parcel tracking, key handling, and daily activity logs. Integrated secure authentication and notification features to boost operational efficiency.

title: Netflix Clone
description: Created a Netflix-like streaming platform with dynamic movie fetching, user authentication, and category-based browsing. Utilized Firebase for secure login and API integration for real-time content updates, delivering an engaging user experience.
